entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Wawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:53 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Drizzle, 4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 12:40 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Light Drizzle
Temperature: 4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 4.0°C
Wind: SW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or snow. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle changing to flurries this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
